dependent_to.name: py-cffconvert
dependent_to.description: Command line program to validate and convert CITATION.cff files.

dependent_to.name: reframe
dependent_to.description:
ReFrame is a framework for writing regression tests for HPC systems. The
goal of this framework is to abstract away the complexity of the
interactions with the system, separating the logic of a regression test
from the low-level details, which pertain to the system configuration
and setup. This allows users to write easily portable regression tests,
focusing only on the functionality.

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.

dependent_to.name: py-geopmdpy
dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.

dependent_to.name: py-melissa-core
dependent_to.description:
Melissa is a file-avoiding, adaptive, fault-tolerant and elastic
framework, to run large-scale sensitivity analysis or deep-surrogate
training on supercomputers. This package builds the launcher and server
modules.

dependent_to.name: py-maestrowf
dependent_to.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.

dependent_to.name: py-warlock
dependent_to.description: Self-validating Python objects using JSON schema

dependent_to.name: py-asdf
dependent_to.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.

dependent_to.name: geopm-service
dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely. Note:
GEOPM interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs).
For proper usage make sure MSRs are made available via the msr or msr-
safe kernel modules by your administrator.

dependent_to.name: py-swagger-spec-validator
dependent_to.description:
A Python library that validates Swagger Specs against the Swagger 1.2
or Swagger 2.0 specification.

dependent_to.name: callflow

CallFlow is an interactive visual analysis tool that provides a high-
level overview of CCTs together with semantic refinement operations to
progressively explore the CCTs.

dependent_to.name: py-mikado
dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.

dependent_to.name: py-psyclone
dependent_to.description:
Code generation system developed to support domain-specific languages
(DSLs) for finite element, finite volume and finite difference codes.
Notably, it is used in the LFRic Project from the UK Met Office, and it
also supports the GOcean (2D, finite difference) DSL.

dependent_to.name: singularity-hpc
dependent_to.description:
Local filesystem registry for containers (intended for HPC) using Lmod
or Environment Modules. Works for users and admins.
